entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 7:07 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 60%
